original_text: When we tell people about Christ, we are like a lovely smell that rises up to God. We are like that among the people that God is saving. We are also like that among the people who are dying because they are far from God.
korean_text: 우리는 구원 받는 자들에게나 망하는 자들에게나 하나님 앞에서 그리스도의 향기니

sentences.original_text: When we tell people about Christ
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 사람들에게 그리스도에 대해 말할 때

sentences.original_text: we are like a lovely smell
among the people that God is saving
among the people who are dying
because they are far from God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 하나님에게서 멀리 떨어져 있기 때문입니다
